New Members are Welcome!

Come visit us for breakfast, every Tuesday at 7:01am

Visit LeTip Summerlin, Las Vegas

We're actively looking for new members to join the Summerlin Chapter of LeTip. We'd love to have you attend one of our regular meetings. LeTip Summerlin only accepts one representative in any given category, to avoid a conflict of interest and to help ensure your success with our networking group. If you would like to find out if your category is open in our Chapter, please contact the Regional Director or search the Members Directory.

FIVE Reasons To Join LeTip Summerlin

  1. LeTip membership puts “Dollars in your pocket“.
  2. LeTip members learn to be better public speakers.
  3. LeTip is a family and members are loyal to one another.
  4. LeTip members have a reliable source of business professionals to recommend to clients, family and friends.
  5. LeTip stimulates the “Feel Good Factor” that great feeling we get in our hearts when we help another towards success.

Join us at Mimi's Cafe, South Fort Apache Road, Las Vegas, NV

1121 South Fort Apache Road</br> Las Vegas, NV 89117

This place is great. The food is great. Parking in the back.

Make 2017 the best year ever for your business!
